de.slothsoft.charts.piechart

Class PieSlice

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.slothsoft.charts.piechart.PieSlice

  • public class PieSlice
extends Object
    A single slice of the PieChart. These slices are entirely dependent on the PieChart, so they can only be generated via PieChart.addSlice(double) and PieChart.addSlices(double...).
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Stef Schulz
